commit.message:
gimple.c (free_gimple_type_tables): New function.

2009-10-08  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* gimple.c (free_gimple_type_tables): New function.
	* gimple.h (free_gimple_type_tables): Declare.

	lto/
	* lto.c (read_cgraph_and_symbols): Free the gimple type merging
	hash tables.

From-SVN: r152562
